item.title: THE FINALS coming to PS4 on December 12; PS5 Pro update now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/the-finals-coming-to-ps4-on-december-12-ps5-pro-update-now-available

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Free-to-play multiplayer first-person shooter goes last-gen.

Embark Studios will release a PlayStation 4 version of free-to-play multiplayer first-person shooter THE FINALS on December 12, the developer announced during The Golden Joystick Awards 2024. A PlayStation 5 Pro patch is also now live for the PlayStation 5 version.

THE FINALS first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on December 7, 2023.

A teaser for the game’s fifth season was also shown:

Here is an overview of the game, via Embark Studios:

Come out on top, reach THE FINALS, and win the hearts of the viewers.

In THE FINALS, nothing can stand in your way. Crash through walls and ceilings, destroy anything and everything in sight, and build bridges and barricades in this fast-paced, high-stakes fight for fame on the world’s biggest stage.

THE FINALS may be a team sport, but you’ll fight for individual glory too. Build your contestant with a wild combination of looks, abilities, accessories, weapons, and gadgets.

Trap and surprise your opponents with a range of dynamic tools scattered throughout the arena. Send exploding canisters of gas and goo through the air, burst through windows, or drop fire from above.

Use moving platforms, ziplines, jump pads, and more to create treacherous and unforgettable moments. Take out your enemies with garbage cans, flowerpots, office chairs, and hospital beds.

Only your imagination sets the limits.

item.title: Overthrown launches in Early Access for Xbox Series and PC on December 5
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/overthrown-launches-in-early-access-for-xbox-series-and-pc-on-december-5

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Full release due out in 2025 with PlayStation 5 version.

Open-world city builder Overthrown will launch in Early Access for Xbox Series and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on December 5, followed by a full release for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC in 2025, publisher Maximum Entertainment and developer Brimstone Games announced. It will also be available via Game Pass for console, PC, and cloud.

Get the latest details below.

Coming off a successful Steam Next Fest demo last month, where the game hit the top 40 most played games list during the festival, Overthrown will launch with new buildings, beautiful fall and winter foliage, and military structures.

In Overthrown, hurl anything and everything—from houses and trees to your very own citizens—to create and rule your kingdom. Build and manage alone or with friends in up to six-player cooperative play. Harness the power of your magical crown to defend townsfolk from bandits and mutants. But don’t lose it! There’s a new ruler waiting in the wings to take your spot!

Gather resources, grow crops, and explore a diverse and colorful world to turn a fledgling state into a commanding, self-sustaining community. Visit the powder mill, ale house, blast furnace, and butcher shop. Experience diverse player outfits and enemy types and make the land yours.

Watch a new trailer below.

Early Access Release Date Trailer
